Title: Establishes the first responder epinephrine preparedness initiative (EPI) act
Summary: Establishes the first responder epinephrine preparedness initiative (EPI) act, creating a first responder epinephrine access program; authorizes the commissioner of health to approve and implement a municipal epinephrine bulk purchase program; authorizes taxpayers to contribute a gift for municipal epinephrine bulk purchases; establishes a municipal epinephrine bulk purchase fund.
LawCode: Add §3000-f, amd §206, Pub Health L; add §§209-Q & 630-l, Tax L; add §97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "first responder epinephrine preparedness initiative (EPI) act"
